summary: Fix Dual dagger powerattacks even with TK combat or Ultimate combat
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod for myself but I thought I should share if anyone want.
Dual wield powerattacks with daggers do not benefit from weaponspeed in vanilla. USKP fixes this by changing the 1hm behavior, but TK also edit that file for his TK Combat, Ultimate combat or TK dodge mod. 
This mod simply merges both edits into a single one.

Just overwrite files after downlaoding both mods.
It can work without USKP or TK mods but it would be redunbant since there is already [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36453/?]a mod[/url] for this if you do not use TK combat and do not like USKP

I plan to also incorporate changes from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59487/?]blocking combat behavior improvement[/url] but I'm already busy doing something else so it should take time.

[b]My other mods :[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59055/?]Sprint while casting[/url]
author: Sabri
